# newMultiTokenContexts

**Instance Property**

An array of updated multitoken contexts for a multimerchant payment request.

## Declaration

```swift
sequence <ApplePayPaymentTokenContext> newMultiTokenContexts;
```

## Discussion

Provide this object to update the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/multiTokenContexts] value in the original [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest], if necessary, after the user updated their payment method.



## Updating multitoken or multimerchant payments

- **ApplePayPaymentTokenContext**: A dictionary that defines the context for a single payment token in a payment request for multimerchant payments.
